author: Julia Alexander
title: Quibi is coming, with the worst — or maybe best — timing
description: Jeffrey Katzenberg and Meg Whitman envisioned a streaming service for mobile-only short video to be watched while people are on the go. Now that so many people are stuck at home, their big experiment is a whole lot more complicated. Are people willing to pay …
content:
Jeffrey Katzenbergs big experiment just got a whole lot more complicated
Illustration by Alex Castro
Quibi was never supposed to compete with Netflix or Disney Plus.
The novelty was shortform video for people as they waited for coffee or the bus. The space… [+5622 chars]
